data: `minecraft:behavior.look_at_target` allows an entity to look at the target by rotating the head bone pose within a set limit.
`minecraft:behavior.look_at_target` requires a target in order to work properly. Target can be determined by using one of the following behaviors:

data.Name: angle_of_view_horizontal
data.Description: TThe angle in degrees that the mob can see in the X-axis (left-right)

data.Name: angle_of_view_vertical
data.Description: The angle in degrees that the mob can see in the Y-axis (up-down)

data.Name: look_distance
data.Description: The distance in blocks from which the entity will look at

data.Name: look_time
data.Description: Time range to look at the entity

data.Name: probability
data.Description: The probability of looking at the target. A value of 1.00 is 100%
